name: Save the chicken
description:
Game

In the game "Save the chicken", the player will have to help a chicken escape from a secret government laboratory. To do so, he will count on the help of unfriendly zombies.

Controls Trailers Trailer #1 Trailer #2 Developers Gonzalo HerreroArtist, Designer and ProgrammerIker GutiérrezArtist, Designer and Programmer
